description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) of planning application ref: P/2014/6490 (Alterations to the coach house including, replacement of roof structure and renewal of roof coverings including the installation of two rooflights within the north roofslope and widening of existing vehicular entrance fronting The Park (Associated with proposed works to a Listed Building involving removal of cement renders and repointing using lime mortar; brickwork repairs and repointing; removal of tie rods; joinery repairs to coach doors, semi-circular window and east gable end window; reconfiguration of door opening to re-instate stable door; replacement of rainwater goods in cast iron) (Approved 18 2 2015) Amendments to previously approved scheme of repairs and alterations by reinstatement of door (in position of original stable door) and new ground floor arched window built in original position.
